{"id":826063942,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1666200686,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"337 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/826063942/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"20.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n    int count=0;\n    int maxcount=0;\n    string current_string;\n    for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++)\n    {\n        if(current_string.find(s[i])==current_string.npos || current_string.empty())\n        {\n            current_string.push_back(s[i]);\n            cout<<\"string after added\"<<current_string<<\"in the\"<<i<<\"th iteration.\"<<endl;\n            count++;\n            if(count>maxcount)\n                maxcount=count;\n        }\n        else\n        {\n            int pos=current_string.find(s[i]);\n            current_string=current_string.substr(pos+1,current_string.npos);\n            current_string.push_back(s[i]);\n            cout<<\"string after added\"<<current_string<<endl;\n            count=current_string.size();\n\n\n        }\n    }\n\n    return maxcount;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
